alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Indian River, south central Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Blue Cypress Lake, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Sebastian, Fellsmere, Malabar and Sebastian Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola
